players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
You: "I agree with Bob - Charlie's death is concerning. We need to be very careful about our vote today since there are only three of us left."

Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding out who killed Charlie last night. Given the current situation, I suggest that we all share any suspicious activities or observations we had during the night."
You: "Diana, that's a good suggestion. I didn't notice anything suspicious myself during the night. Bob, did you observe anything unusual? We should definitely work together to figure this out."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
